      • getTopologies

        public java.util.ArrayList<Topology> getTopologies()
        Get all topologies.

        Query about all the topologies stored in memory.

        Returns:
        Topology list from memory.

      • queryDevices

        public java.util.ArrayList<Component> queryDevices(java.lang.String topologyID)
        Get topology by id.

        Query about a specific topology by id.

        Parameters:
        topologyID - Topology id
        Returns:
        A list of all the components in the topology
        Throws:
        BadRequestException - if topology id is not found in memory

      • deleteTopology

        public boolean deleteTopology(java.lang.String topologyID)
                       throws BadRequestException
        Delete a topology from memory by id.
        Parameters:
        topologyID - Topology id
        Returns:
        true if topology is deleted, or else throws BadRequestException
        Throws:
        BadRequestException - if topology id is not found in memory

      • writeJson

        public void writeJson(java.lang.String topologyID)
               throws BadRequestException,
                      InternalServerError
        Write a topology to file.

        Save a topology from memory to a file on disk.

        Parameters:
        topologyID - Topology id
        Throws:
        BadRequestException - if topology id is not found in memory
        InternalServerError - if there was an error during writing to file

      • readJson

        public java.util.Map<?,?> readJson(java.lang.String fileName)
                            throws BadRequestException,
                                   InternalServerError
        Read a topology from file.

        Read a topology from a file on disk to memory.

        Parameters:
        fileName - Topology file name
        Returns:
        Topology object
        Throws:
        BadRequestException - if the topology was already in memory
        InternalServerError - if there was an error during reading from file

      • queryDevicesWithNetListNode

        public java.util.ArrayList<Component> queryDevicesWithNetListNode(java.lang.String topologyID,
                                                                  java.lang.String netListNode)
                                                           throws BadRequestException
        Query devices that are connected to a specific netlist node.
        Parameters:
        topologyID - Topology id
        netListNode - Netlist node
        Returns:
        A list of all the components connected to that netlist node
        Throws:
        BadRequestException - if topology id is not found in memory
